articles.author: Iain Carter
articles.title: 'Stirring Sunday fightback cannot hide US Ryder Cup shortcomings' - BBC
articles.description: America's final-day comeback brought unexpected respectability to the final score - but also exposed how far the US lag behind Europe in their Ryder Cup efforts, writes Iain Carter.
articles.content:
Bradley had selected vice-captains Kevin Kisner and Gary Woodland despite neither having any Ryder Cup experience - compare that with Europe's stacked backroom team.

articles.author: Jessica Alvarado Gamez
articles.title: Starbucks closes at least 11 locations along Colorado’s Front Range - The Denver Post
articles.description: The Seattle-based coffee giant is closing hundreds of stores across the U.S., Canada and Europe.
articles.content:
Starbucks has closed at least 11 locations in metro Denver and Fort Collins after announcing plans last week to shutter hundreds of stores across the United States, Canada and Europe.
